      • checkForPlaceholders

        public static void checkForPlaceholders(DAGNode<Component,Dependency> graph,
                                        org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                 throws RecommenderConfigurationException

        Check a graph for placeholder satisfactions.

        Parameters:
        graph - The graph to check.
        Throws:
        RecommenderConfigurationException - if the graph has a placeholder satisfaction.

        Get the placeholder nodes from a graph.

        Parameters:
        graph - The graph.
        Returns:
        The set of nodes that have placeholder satisfactions.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getShareableNodes

        public static LinkedHashSet<DAGNode<Component,Dependency>> getShareableNodes(DAGNode<Component,Dependency> graph)

        Find the set of shareable nodes (objects that will be replaced with instance satisfactions in the final graph).

        Parameters:
        graph - The graph to analyze.
        Returns:
        The set of root nodes - nodes that need to be instantiated and removed. These nodes are in topologically sorted order.

      • findSatisfyingNode

        @Nullable
public static DAGNode<Component,Dependency> findSatisfyingNode(DAGNode<Component,Dependency> graph,
                                                                          QualifierMatcher qmatch,
                                                                          Class<?> type)

        Find a node with a satisfaction for a specified type. Does a breadth-first search to find the closest matching one.

        Parameters:
        type - The type to look for.
        Returns:
        A node whose satisfaction is compatible with type.
